lexUnit.name: rape.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: the crime of forcing another to have sexual intercourse without their consent

sentence.text: In Cogan and Leak , it was held that a husband could be liable for rape if he forced his wife to have sexual intercourse with a third party who was unaware of her lack of consent .
